a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Distribution of income across richer and poorer groups, United States,
The share of income received by different income groups. Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income
measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2024)
